characters: Driver of a white sedan, a man on a motorized tricycle
summary: The video shows a white sedan approaching an intersection. A man on a motorized tricycle, wearing a helmet and orange clothing, emerges from behind a parked car on the right side of the road. The tricycle moves into the path of the sedan, creating a near-miss situation. The driver of the sedan appears to brake slightly to avoid a collision. The tricycle then continues its journey.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a steady speed until a motorized tricycle appears from the right, partially obstructing the path. The driver of the self-driving vehicle slightly decelerates to avoid a collision. The vehicle maintains its lane and continues straight.
key_objects: Right: A man on a motorized tricycle, wearing a helmet and orange clothing, approximately 2 meters away at closest point, suddenly emerged from behind a parked car and crossed the path of the self-driving vehicle, causing a near-miss.
